Title: Corrigendum to “Intraoperative Ultrasound in Patients Undergoing Transsphenoidal Surgery for Pituitary Adenoma: Systematic Review” [World Neurosurgery 106 (2017) 680-685](S1878875017311543)(10.1016/j.wneu.2017.07.054)
Abstract: © 2017 Elsevier Inc.The authors regret that there was a typo in the title of this article, where the word “Transsphenoidal” was originally printed as “Transsphoidal”. The authors would like to apologise for any inconvenience caused. DOI of original article: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.wneu.2017.07.054
